solution_line_template: She strength trains {strength_sessions_per_week}*{strength_session_duration}=<<{strength_sessions_per_week}*{strength_session_duration}={strength_hours}>>{strength_hours} hours a week
She does boxing training {boxing_sessions_per_week}*{boxing_session_duration}=<<{boxing_sessions_per_week}*{boxing_session_duration}={boxing_hours}>>{boxing_hours} hours a week
So she trains a total of {strength_hours}+{boxing_hours}=<<{strength_hours}+{boxing_hours}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours a week
